auth_identity.description: The identity to use for authentication.

auth_password.description: AuthPassword defines secret name and key at CRD namespace.

auth_secret.description: AuthSecret defines secret name and key at CRD namespace. It must contain the CRAM-MD5 secret.

auth_username.description: The username to use for authentication.

from.description: The sender address. fallback to global setting if empty

headers.description: Further headers email header key/value pairs. Overrides any headers previously set by the notification implementation.

hello.description: The hostname to identify to the SMTP server.

html.description: The HTML body of the email notification.

require_tls.description: The SMTP TLS requirement. Note that Go does not support unencrypted connections to remote SMTP endpoints.

send_resolved.description: SendResolved controls notify about resolved alerts.

smarthost.description: The SMTP host through which emails are sent. fallback to global setting if empty

text.description: The text body of the email notification.

to.description: The email address to send notifications to.
